Quick search

Study UID Importer API¶

class xnat_wrapper.uid_importer.UIDImporter(xnat, project, uids=[], filters={}, studies={})¶

Class that provides methods to import studies/scans to an XNAT project using a list of study UIDs.

Parameters

  • xnat (class) – An open XNAT connection via pyxnat.Interface()

  • project (str) – Name of the XNAT project

  • uids (str or list, optional) – A list of study UIDs that will be imported

  • filters (dict, optional) – Dictionary with keys corresponding to the keyword (e.g. seriesDescription) and values corresponding to a list of approved values (e.g. [Ax T1,`Ax T2`]).

  • studies (dict, optional) – Dictionary with key values corresponding to study UIDs and values corresponding to study descriptions.

__init__(xnat, project, uids=[], filters={}, studies={})¶

Constructor method

__weakref__¶

list of weak references to the object (if defined)

check_import_queue(project=None)¶

Checks the XNAT import queue for all items related to the project

Parameters

project (str, optional) – The name of the project which will be used to filter the studies

Returns

Dictionary containing the total number of sessions, total number of scans, and a list of all sessions

Return type

dict

find_studies(uids=[])¶

Find studies using a list of study UIDs

Parameters

uids (list, optional) – List of study UIDs

get_studies()¶

Get the list of currently loaded studies

Returns

Dictionary with key values corresponding to study UIDs

Return type

dict

import_studies(studies=None)¶

Imports a list of studies into an XNAT project

Parameters

studies (dict, optional) – Dictionary with key values corresponding to study UIDs

Returns

True if request was successful, False otherwise

Return type

bool

monitor_import_queue(timeout=180, time_refresh=True)¶

Monitors the status of studies that are being imported to a project.

Parameters

  • timeout (int, optional) – The amount of time (in seconds) to monitor the queue, defaults to 180

  • time_refresh (bool, optional) – Tells the monitor whether or not to restart the timeout if there is a status change, defaults to True

set_filters(filt={})¶

Sets the filters that will be used to filter the list of studies imported into a project.

Parameters

filt (dict, optional) – Dictionary with keys corresponding to the keyword (e.g. seriesDescription) and values corresponding to a list of approved values (e.g. [Ax T1,`Ax T2`]).

set_project(project)¶

Sets the project name for the UID importer

Parameters

project (str) – Name of the XNAT project

set_scp_params(project=None)¶

Sets the parameters for the XNAT DICOM/SCP connection.

Parameters

project (str, optional) – Name of the XNAT project to use

set_uids(uids=[])¶

Sets the UIDs that the import tool will look for and download (if found).

Parameters

uids (list or str, optional) – Single or list of study UIDs
